amendatorysection.catchline: Licensees; exempt from Uniform Disposition of Unclaimed Property Act.
amendatorysection.para: Those corporations or associations eligible for licenses to conduct horseracing by the parimutuel method as defined in section 2-1204, shall be exempt from the provisions of the Uniform Disposition of Unclaimed Property Act.

crossreference.para: Uniform Disposition of Unclaimed Property Act, see section 69-1329.
